GSD.product_version: versions from v4.20 to before v5.4.208
GSD.description:
igc: Reinstate IGC_REMOVED logic and implement it properly

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.208 by commit 16cb6717f4f42487ef10583eb8bc98e7d1e33d65, it was introduced in version v4.20 by commit 146740f9abc4976e4f0af1aa302efee1c699d2e4. For more details please see the references link.
